title: [Glatoph, Glacier]
description: Higher up the mountain, the chill wind carries a hint of snow.  Lacy ice crystals twinkle in the shadows under bushes and beside rocks.  Frilly moss outlined with glittering frost, clings to the stones and softens the edges of their shadows against the deeper black of the night.

Higher up the mountain, the chill wind carries a hint of snow.  Lacy ice crystals twinkle in the shadows under bushes and beside rocks.  Frilly moss, outlined with glittering frost, clings to the rock.
